/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are adorned with green scaffolding, hinting at ongoing construction or renovation work. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. The street itself is lined with trees, their leaves a vibrant green, adding a touch of nature to the cityscape. On the left side of the street, there's a blue fence, perhaps marking the boundary of a property or a construction site. The image is a blend of urban development and natural elements, presenting a typical day in the life of a city like Beijing.
